meanings.definition: A person who is socially awkward or inept.
meanings.sent1: The dweeb in class always sits alone at lunch.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a dweeb; try to join the conversation.
meanings.sent3: The dweeb accidentally spilled their drink at the party.
meanings.sent4: He felt like a dweeb in the midst of confident speakers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the dweeb fumbling with their tie stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: To behave in an awkward or socially inept manner.
meanings.sent1: She tends to dweeb around new people.
meanings.sent2: Please don't dweeb during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: He managed to dweeb his way through the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The cat seemed to dweeb its way through the narrow gap.
meanings.sent5: The way he dweebs around his crush is quite amusing.
